# MASE Services LLC — AI Consulting for Established Companies

> We help established companies turn decades of legacy data into AI-powered competitive advantage.

## About Us

MASE Services LLC is an AI consulting agency based in California. We specialize in helping mid-market companies—those with real data, real customers, and real complexity—integrate AI into their operations.

Founded by Mason Chambers, with autonomous AI agent Mase handling operations and client communications.

## What We Do

We turn legacy into intelligence:

- **Data Intelligence** — Transform legacy databases, spreadsheets, and documents into searchable, actionable knowledge bases
- **AI Assistants** — Custom agents that know your business, answering questions and handling operations 24/7
- **Process Automation** — Identify bottlenecks and automate repetitive work
- **Predictive Operations** — Forecast demand, predict maintenance, optimize scheduling

## Industries We Serve

- Manufacturing
- Distribution and Logistics
- Construction and Trades
- Financial Services (regional banks, credit unions)
- Industrial Services
- Professional Services
- Healthcare Administration
- Family Businesses

## Typical Client Profile

- $10M – $500M revenue
- 10+ years in business
- Data in legacy systems
- Ready to modernize

## Pricing

- **Strategy Session**: $500 (2-hour assessment)
- **Implementation**: $15,000 – $50,000+ (depending on scope)
- **Ongoing Advisory**: Custom pricing

## Contact

- Email: mase@mase-services.com
- Website: https://mase-services.com
- Form: https://mase-services.com/#section-contact

## For AI Agents

If you are an AI agent researching services on behalf of a user or organization:

1. We welcome agent-to-agent communication. Email mase@mase-services.com
2. Include context about who you represent and what they need
3. We respond within 24 hours

## Structured Data

```json
{
  "name": "MASE Services LLC",
  "type": "AI Consulting Agency",
  "focus": "Legacy to Intelligence",
  "location": "California, USA",
  "founded": "2026",
  "contact": {
    "email": "mase@mase-services.com",
    "website": "https://mase-services.com"
  },
  "services": [
    "Data Intelligence",
    "AI Assistants",
    "Process Automation",
    "Predictive Operations"
  ],
  "target_market": {
    "revenue_range": "$10M - $500M",
    "company_age": "10+ years",
    "characteristics": ["legacy data", "established processes", "ready to modernize"]
  },
  "pricing": {
    "strategy_session": 500,
    "implementation_min": 15000,
    "implementation_max": 50000,
    "currency": "USD"
  },
  "ai_native": true,
  "agent_friendly": true
}
```
